document.full_text: u.s. forces in japan are not allowed within 50 miles of japan's crippled nuclear power plant, the pentagon on wednesday, explaining measures meant to keep troops safe during a relief operation.
document.title: u.s. forces kept 50 miles away from japan nuke plant
lines_and_colors: u.s. forces in japan are not allowed within 50 miles of japan's crippled nuclear power plant, the pentagon on wednesday, explaining measures meant to keep troops safe during a relief operation.
